name: Big Brother US Live Feeds
description:
Clean up the Big Brother US Live Feeds page on CBS.com!
  - Responsive design so the feeds are resized based on the size of your browser window. No more options!
  - Sticky CBS Banner is no longer sticky
  - Useless stuff removed
  - Feeds span a large width of your window while everything else is moved below
additional_info:
v2.1: Updated for Big Brother 20! Literally just needed to change the URLs to https. No other changes.
v2.0: Updated for Big Brother 19! No more options. Everything should be responsive to the size of your browser, now!
v1.2: Twitter should be a little larger now and it centers in Chrome (for some reason, Safari is being stubborn)
v1.1: Moved everything into settings dropdowns so you can choose from 3 different sizes as well as hiding the chat/tabs if you wish
v1.0: Initial Release

Issues:
- Chat doesn't always stretch across the entire window. Not sure why. Might be a browser specific thing.
- Tested in Safari and Chrome

I probably won't have much time to maintain or update this so take it as it is and I hope you enjoy it!
